subject: Economy
topic: GST (Goods and Services Tax): Avdharna aur Prabhav
question_en: How has the Goods and Services Tax (GST) system affected the Indian economy?
question_hi: इस्लामी के संबंधी क्या लाभ और कठिनाइयों का अनुभवों का अध्ययन करें
A_en: GST has led to increased revenue for the Indian government.
A_hi: क्या गॉड़ियाँ के संबंधी आरंभ करें
B_en: GST has reduced the burden of multiple taxes on businesses.
B_hi: गॉड़ियाँ के विशेषज्ञान दोनों का उपयोग करें
C_en: GST has led to inflation due to sudden price increase.

L_en: GST has led to increased revenue for the central and state governments.
